info.title: Aquaforest PDF
info.description: Aquaforest PDF connector contains a group of actions that performs different PDF operations like splitting, text extraction, barcode extraction and OCR operations for Office 365 and Flow.

post.description: Get Barcode From PDF. Visit [https://www.aquaforest.com/en/aquaforest-flow-doc.asp] for more information.
Gets the information about a PDF file
This action will extract important data from PDF files in the form of Key/Value pairs.
Get Text From PDF files based on the text location and regular expressions. Visit [https://www.aquaforest.com/en/aquaforest-flow-doc.asp] for more information.
Generate searchable PDF from an image PDF or scanned images. Visit [https://www.aquaforest.com/en/aquaforest-flow-doc.asp] for more information.

parameters.name: ocr_data
parameters.description: The source document on which OCR is to be performed

post.description: Splits PDF files based on barcode matches defined by the user. Visit [https://www.aquaforest.com/en/aquaforest-flow-doc.asp] for documentation. In addition the Aquaforest Zonal Extraction Tool is available at [https://www.aquaforest.com/en/zone/get-pdf-zone.html].

Splits PDF files based on text matches defined by the user. Visit [https://www.aquaforest.com/en/aquaforest-flow-doc.asp] for documentation. In addition the Aquaforest Zonal Extraction Tool is available at [https://www.aquaforest.com/en/zone/get-pdf-zone.html].
Extract PDF files based on barcode matches defined by the user. Visit [https://www.aquaforest.com/en/aquaforest-flow-doc.asp] for more information.
Extract PDF files based on text matches defined by the user. Visit [https://www.aquaforest.com/en/aquaforest-flow-doc.asp] for more information.
Splits PDF files based on split options defined by the user. Visit [https://www.aquaforest.com/en/aquaforest-flow-doc.asp] for documentation.

get.description: Gets the schema of the selected list
get.summary: Gets the item schema of the selected list

ErrorMessage.description: If the value of Is Successful is false, we will return an Error Message

IsSuccessful.description: This will return true if at least one page was extracted

TextResult.description: A string generated from applying the extracted text to the Text Result Template provided. Note if the page count is greater than one will concatenate all the pages using the Page Separator.

TextResults.description: An array containing a list of pages and the extracted text values

pageNumber.description: The page where the text was found

valueExtracted.description: A string generated from applying the extracted text to the Text Result Template provided.

zoneValues.description: An array containing the text extracted from each zone.

BarcodeResult.description: A string generated from applying the extracted text to the barcode Result Template provided. Note if the page count is greater than one will concatenate all the pages using the Page Separator.

BarcodeResults.description: An array containing a list of pages and the extracted barcode values

pageNumber.description: The page where the barcode was found

valueExtracted.description: A string generated from applying the extracted barcode value to the barcode Result Template provided.

zoneValues.description: An array containing the barcode extracted from each zone.

ErrorMessage.description: If the value of Is Successful is false, we will return an Error Message

LicenceInfo.description: Information about your API subscription key

IsSuccessful.description: This will return true if at least one split page was matched.

zones.description: List of variables that can be used to extract text information from PDF files

expression.description: Provide one or more value(s) here to be used with the property above, we will return the first text value that matches the rule stated above.

location.description: Area of the page - use the Zonal tool to obtain coordinates: [https://www.aquaforest.com/en/zone/get-pdf-zone.html]

position.description: Use this to refine the text you extract more, select an option that matches your requirements
enum: all text in line after value
all text in line before value
all text in zone after value
all text in zone before value

regex.description: If a regular expression is provided here, we will match any extracted text to it and return the match.

barcodeResultTemplate.description: Template for the output text result if a barcode is found

fileContent.description: The content of the source file

noBarcodeTemplate.description: Template for the output text result if no barcode is found

pageSeparator.description: Provide a page separator so that you can know where the page breaks are.

pagerange.description: Provide a page range you want to extract text from, this can be a single page number (1), multiple page numbers separated by commas (1,2,3), a page range (1-4) or a mixture of all (1,2,4-7).

sourceFileName.description: The name of the source file

zones.description: List of variables that can be used to extract barcode information from PDF files

barcodeFormats.description: Specify the types of Barcode you want to identify

location.description: Area of the page - use the Zonal tool to obtain coordinates: [https://www.aquaforest.com/en/zone/get-pdf-zone.html]

pagenumber.description: This property is deprecated, we advise you to use the Pages property. The Pages property applies to all zones and allows you select the pages you want to process.

regex.description: If a regular expression is provided here, we will match any extracted text to it and return the match.

advancedFlags.description: This is used to pass advanced parameters to this action. Do not use this property unless directed by our support team.

settingName.description: Enter the name of the setting here

settingValue.description: Enter the value of the setting here.

confidenceScore.description: Set a higher confidence score to filter out values with lower confidence. You can set any value between 0 and 1. We recommend starting from 0.5

dateAsISO.description: Select which format to return date value as

expectedKeys.description: Provide one key name per line to make values available to later actions without parsing JSON.

fileContent.description: The content of the source file

pageLimit.description: Maximum number of pages to be processed

pageRange.description: A string representation of the page numbers you want to process. E.g 1,3-4

stripCurrencySymbol.description: Set this to true if you want the symbols and strings to be removed before we return currency values

synonym.description: Set this to true if you want us to return all the keys that are synonyms to the expected key.

synonymDictionary.description: You can provide a JSON array of “entry” objects, where each object contains a list of synonyms in an array. For instance, if you want “Invoice No” and “Invoice Number” (case-insensitive) to be interpreted as the same key, use the following JSON: [{'entry': [ 'Invoice No', 'invoice number' ]}]

trimSymbols.description: Set this to true if you want us to remove all leading and trailing symbols from the keys found before we match them to an expected key.

fileContent.description: The content of the source file

pageLimit.description: Maximum number of pages to be processed, this is only used to check if pages contain hidden text or to check if PDF is searchable

AllowAssembly.description: Allow rotation, insertion or deletion of pages.

AllowExtractContents.description: Allow extraction of text and graphics.

AllowExtractForAccessibility.description: Allow extraction of text and graphics in support of accessibility.

CreationDate.description: This is the date and time the PDF was created.

ErrorMessage.description: If the value of Is Successful is false, we will return an Error Message

FileSize.description: The size of the file in bytes

HasHiddenText.description: This will return true if the PDF file has an OCR layer.

IsEncrypted.description: This will return true if this document is encrypted or not.

IsSearchable.description: This will return true if the PDF file is searchable.

IsSuccessful.description: Returns true if the action was successful.

LicenceInfo.description: Json summary of your subscription quota.

ModifiedDate.description: This property represents the date and time the PDF was last modified

NumberofPages.description: The number of pages in the PDF file.

PDFversion.description: The version of the PDF specification the document was built against.

Producer.description: The product that created the PDF. In the early days of PDF people would use a Creator application like Microsoft Word to write a document, print it to a PostScript file and then the Producer would be Acrobat Distiller, the application that converted the PostScript file to a PDF. Nowadays Creator and Producer are often the same or one field is left blank.

Trapped.description: This property is a Boolean value that indicates whether the document has been trapped. Trapping is a pre-press process which introduces color areas into color separations in order to obscure potential register errors.

XmpMetadata.description: The Extensible Metadata Platform (XMP) is an ISO standard, originally created by Adobe Systems Inc., for the creation, processing and interchange of standardized and custom metadata for digital documents and data sets.

fileContent.description: The content of the source file

Page that matches text on last page
Remove the page that matches text

regex.description: If a regular expression is provided here, we will match any extracted text to it and return the match.

fileContent.description: The content of the source file.
fileContent.title: File Content

fileNameTemplate.description: Target file template which can include %UNIQUEn (unique number starting at 1, zero padded to n digits) and %FILENAME (original filename without the extension).
fileNameTemplate.title: Output File Name

sourceFileName.description: The name of the source file.
sourceFileName.title: File Name

splitOption.description: Choose the split operation to use for each file.

pageRange.description: Set of page ranges separated by commas that defines which pages from the original should be extracted.
pageRange.title: Page Range

repeatEvery.description: Apply the page range to each set of Page Ranges pages within the document.  For example if  2-4  is specified for page ranges, and 4 is specified as the repeating range, then the range is re-applied every 4 pages.
repeatEvery.title: Repeat Every

retainBookmarks.description: Generated files will include bookmarks from the original file.

retainMetadata.description: Generated files will include metadata(such as Author and Title) from the original file.

aquaforestImageTimeout.description: Contact technical support (support@aquaforest.com) for guidance on using this property.

author.description: Set a custom Author in the output PDF document properties.

autorotate.description: Auto rotate the image – this will ensure all text oriented normally

binarize.description: This value should generally only be used under guidance from technical support. It can control the way that color images are processed and force binarization with a particular threshold. A value of 200 has been shown to generally give good results in testing, but this should be confirmed with "typical" customer documents. By setting this to -1 an alternative method is used which will attempt to separate the text from any background images or colors. This can give improved OCR results for certain documents such as newspaper and magazine pages.

blackPixelLimit.description: Contact technical support (support@aquaforest.com) for guidance on using this property.

blankPageThreshold.description: Use this to set the minimum number of "On Pixels" that must be present in the image for a page not to be considered blank. A value of -1 will turn off blank page detection.

boxSize.description: This option is ideal for forms where sometimes boxes around text can cause an area to be identified as graphics. This option removes boxes from the temporary copy of the imaged used by the OCR engine. It does not remove boxes from the final image. Technically, this option removes connected elements with a minimum area (in pixels and defined by this property). This option is currently only applied for bi-tonal images.

convertToTiff.description: Each page in the PDF document is rasterized to a TIFF image.

createProcess.description: Set this to true if you want to launch process through pinvoke.

creationDate.description: Set a custom creation date in the output PDF document properties. The date string must be in the format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'.

despeckle.description: This removes all disconnected elements within the image that have height or width in pixels less than the specified figure. The maximum value is 9 and the default value is 0.

dictionaryLookup.description: Contact technical support (support@aquaforest.com) for guidance on using this property.

dotmatrix.description: Set this to true to improve recognition of dot-matrix fonts. Default value is false. If set to true for non dot-matrix fonts then the recognition can be poor.

enableMrc.description: This enables Mixed Raster Compression which can dramatically reduce the output size of PDFs comprising color scans. Note that this option is only suitable when the source is not a PDF or using ConvertToTiff.

enablePDFAOutput.description: Whether or not to output as PDF/A.

errorMode.description: Contact technical support (support@aquaforest.com) for guidance on using this property.

fileContent.description: Content of the file to OCR

fileNameWithExtension.description: The source file name with extension or just the extension (with a leading period '.')

flipDetect.description: Contact technical support (support@aquaforest.com) for guidance on using this property.

grayscaleQuality.description: Contact technical support (support@aquaforest.com) for guidance on using this property.

heuristics.description: Contact technical support (support@aquaforest.com) for guidance on using this property.

jbig2EncFlags.description: These are the flags that will be passed to the application used to generate JBIG2 versions of images used in PDF generation (assuming this compression is enabled). This option should generally only be used under guidance from technical support.

language.description: Selecting one of the option below sets the language to be used for the OCR processing. The default language is English.

libTiffSavePageAsBmp.description: Sometimes if there is an image which is 1bpp and has LZW compression, the pre-processing can cause the colour of the image to be inverted (black to white and white to black). Set this to true to avoid this.

maxDeskew.description: Maximum angle by which a page will be deskewed. This option should generally only be used under guidance from technical support (support@aquaforest.com).

minDeskewConfidence.description: This option should generally only be used under guidance from technical support (support@aquaforest.com).

modifiedDate.description: Set a custom modified date in the output PDF document properties. The date string must be in the format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'.

morph.description: Morphological options that will be applied to the binarized image before OCR. If set to empty none is applied. Common options include those listed below but for more options please contact support@aquaforest.com.

mrcBackgroundFactor.description: Sampling size for the background portion of the image. The higher the number, the larger the size of the image blocks used for averaging which will result in a reduction in size but also quality. Default value is 3

mrcForegroundFactor.description: Sampling size for the foreground portion of the image. The higher the number, the larger the size of the image blocks used for averaging which will result in a reduction in size but also quality. Default value is 3

mrcQuality.description: JPEG quality setting (percentage value 1 - 100) for use in saving the background and foreground images. Default value is 75

mrcTimeout.description: Contact technical support (support@aquaforest.com) for guidance on using this property.

noPictures.description: By default, if an area of the document is identified as a graphic area then no OCR processing is run on that area. However, certain documents may include areas or boxes that are identified as "graphic" or "picture" areas but that actually do contain useful text. Setting NoPictures to True will cause it to ignore areas identified as pictures whilst setting it to False will force OCR of areas identified as pictures.

ocrProcessSetupTimeout.description: Contact technical support (support@aquaforest.com) for guidance on using this property.

ocrTimeout.description: Contact technical support (support@aquaforest.com) for guidance on using this property.

password.description: The password to open the source PDF file

pdfToImageBpp.description: The Bits Per Pixel to use for the rasterized PDF page when using engine 1. This only applies for documents that are processed using ConvertToTiff. The default value for this property is taken from the PDF page.

pdfToImageCompression.description: The compression to set to the images extracted or rasterized from each page of the source PDF file. These images are then OCRed to create the searchable PDF. The default value for this property is taken from each page in the source PDF file.

pdfToImageDpi.description: The DPI to set to the images rasterized from each page of the source PDF file. These images are then OCRed to create the searchable PDF. The default value for this property is taken from each page in the source PDF file.

pdfToImageForceVectorCheck.description: This setting is useful when dealing with documents that contains vector objects (e.g. CAD drawings). By default, pages that contain only vector objects are rasterized. Pages that do not have any images but contain vector objects as well as electronic text are skipped from rasterization. However, sometimes there can be a page that contains vector objects (CAD drawings) but its title may be in electronic text. To force rasterizing pages like these, set this property to true.

pdfToImageIncludeText.description: When set to False this will prevent the conversion of real text (i.e. electronically generated as opposed to text that is part of a scanned image) from being rendered in the page images extracted from the PDF. This is because the text is already searchable and so generally does not require OCR. The value can be set to True however if the OCR is required on this real text.

pdfToImageMaxRes.description: The maximum resolution of the rasterized images. If the resolution retrieved from the PDF page is bigger than this value, it will be set to this value. The default value for this property is 600.

pdfToImageMinRes.description: The minimum resolution of the rasterized images. If the resolution retrieved from the PDF page is lower than this value, it will be set to this value. The default value for this property is 200.

pipeClientConnectionTimeout.description: Contact technical support (support@aquaforest.com) for guidance on using this property.

removeBlankPage.description: Remove blank pages when BlankPageThreshold is greater than -1 and ConvertToTiff is true.

removeLines.description: Remove lines from images fpr better recognition.

restartEngineEvery.description: Contact technical support (support@aquaforest.com) for guidance on using this property.

retainBookmarks.description: Retains any bookmarks from the source file in the output when using ConvertToTiff.

retainCreationDate.description: Retains the creation date of the source file in the output PDF document properties.

retainMetadata.description: Retains any metadata from the source file in the output when using ConvertToTiff.

retainModifiedDate.description: Retains the modified date of the source file in the output PDF document properties.

retainViewerPreferences.description: Retains any PDF Viewer Preferences, Page Mode and Page Layout from source file in the output when using ConvertToTiff.

savePredespeckle.description: This will use the original image (i.e. before applying pre-processing) in the output PDF.

tables.description: This option when set to true, tries to OCR within table cells.

textLayerFilterHeight.description: Contact technical support (support@aquaforest.com) for guidance on using this property.

textLayerFilterHeightInverted.description: Contact technical support (support@aquaforest.com) for guidance on using this property.

textLayerFilterPercentage.description: Contact technical support (support@aquaforest.com) for guidance on using this property.

textLayerFilterPercentageInverted.description: Contact technical support (support@aquaforest.com) for guidance on using this property.

textLayerFilterRatio.description: Contact technical support (support@aquaforest.com) for guidance on using this property.

textLayerFilterRatioInverted.description: Contact technical support (support@aquaforest.com) for guidance on using this property.

textLayerFilterWidth.description: Contact technical support (support@aquaforest.com) for guidance on using this property.

textLayerFilterWidthInverted.description: Contact technical support (support@aquaforest.com) for guidance on using this property.

textLayerMaxBoxes.description: Contact technical support (support@aquaforest.com) for guidance on using this property.

tidyUpMode.description: Contact technical support (support@aquaforest.com) for guidance on using this property.

validatePDFA.description: Whether or not to validate the PDF/A document after conversion

wordMatchThreshold.description: Contact technical support (support@aquaforest.com) for guidance on using this property.

ErrorMessage.description: If the value of Is Successful is false, we will return an Error Message

IsSuccessful.description: Returns true if the OCR was successful.

LicenceInfo.description: Information about your API subscription key

LogFileContent.description: The log contents of the operation

OutputFileContent.description: File generated by the Aquaforest PDF converter.
